```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
library(plotly)
library(shiny)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

Improved Visual
=======================================================================

```{r import data, include=FALSE}

remote <- read_xlsx(here("data", "remote_work.xlsx"))

remote <- remote %>% 
  rename(
    time_period = `Time period`
  )

remote <- remote %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(Few, Many, Most),
    names_to = "bucket",
    values_to = "percentage"
  )


```


```{r}

remote %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x = factor(time_period, levels = c("Before", "During", "After"), ordered = TRUE), y = percentage, fill = bucket), width = 0.50) +
  labs(
    title = "Executives are Embracing Work From Home",
    subtitle = "Bucketed into ",
    x = element_blank(),
    y = element_blank()
  ) +
  theme(
    text = element_text(family = "Avenir"),
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    legend.text = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "none",
    plot.background = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(), 
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12)
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("grey80", "lightblue", "royalblue")) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(.50, 1), labels = scales::percent_format()) +
  geom_text(x = 3.53, y = .70, label = "Few <20%", color = "grey80") +
  geom_text(x = 3.55, y = .40, label = "Many 30-50%", color = "lightblue") +
  geom_text(x = 3.55, y = .05, label = "Most >60%", color = "royalblue") +
  geom_text(x = 1.01, y = .30, label = "39%", color = "lightblue", size = 11) +
  geom_text(x = 2.01, y = .68, label = "77%", color = "lightblue", size = 11) +
  geom_text(x = 3.01, y = .46, label = "55%", color = "lightblue", size = 11)
  

```
